thread.title: Who's been sleeping in my bed: Another Airbnb shocker
thread.title_full: Who's been sleeping in my bed: Another Airbnb shocker

title: Who's been sleeping in my bed: Another Airbnb shocker
text:
* Rugby World Cup star lists luxury home on Airbnb 
The problem was, Corwin had never actually listed his property. 
So who was to blame? After doing a little digging around on the Airbnb website, Corwin found that his room had been listed - by his flatmate. 
Needless to say the flatmate was kicked out not too long after the incident, but Corwin still wants answers. 
Airbnb reportedly told Corwin, "Airbnb does not own, operate, manage or control accommodations, nor do we verify private contract terms or arbitrate complaints from third parties." 
This isn't the first time Airbnb has hit the headlines for all the wrong reasons. 
In April, 2015 a couple who rented out their house on Airbnb returned to find it had been trashed, in what Canadian police described as a "drug-induced orgy". 
Mark and Star King said they were almost knocked over by the fumes when they walked into their home, in Sage Hill, north-west Calgary, after a weekend away. 
They were then confronted with the destruction. 
Their furniture had been destroyed, smashed glass littered the floor, and piles of cigarette butts, food and rubbish were strewn throughout the house. 
The toilet was flooded and mustard, mayonnaise and sauce were smeared across the walls and floors. 
Do you have a horror Airbnb story to share? Tell us in the comments below. - Stuff
